item.title: [snc] A-Sewer Crocodile
item.description:
Creature — Crocodile

{3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [snc] A-Public Enemy
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

All creatures attack enchanted creature's controller each combat if able.

When enchanted creature dies, draw two cards.

item.title: [snc] A-Psionic Snoop
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Flash

When Psionic Snoop enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

item.title: [snc] A-Vampire Scrivener
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warlock

Flying

Whenever you gain life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.

Whenever you lose life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.

item.title: [snc] A-Demon's Due
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [snc] A-Case the Joint
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw three cards, then look at the top card of each player's library.

item.title: [snc] A-Midnight Assassin
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Assassin

Flying, deathtouch

item.title: [snc] A-Graveyard Shift
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell has flash as long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [snc] A-Incriminate
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.

item.title: [snc] A-Revel Ruiner
item.description:
Creature — Cephalid Rogue

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

When Revel Ruiner enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

item.title: [snc] A-Exhibition Magician
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Exhibition Magician enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

• Create a Treasure token.

item.title: [snc] A-Deal Gone Bad
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. You gain 3 life.

item.title: [snc] A-Sizzling Soloist
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, that creature attacks during its controller's next combat phase if able.

item.title: [snc] A-Ready to Rumble
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Damage can't be prevented this turn. Ready to Rumble deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [snc] A-Pyre-Sledge Arsonist
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Shaman

{1}, {T}: Pyre-Sledge Arsonist deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of permanents you've sacrificed this turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Jackhammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [snc] A-Warm Welcome
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

item.title: [snc] A-Most Wanted
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

When enchanted creature dies, create two Treasure tokens.

item.title: [snc] A-Social Climber
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

item.title: [snc] A-High-Rise Sawjack
item.description:
Creature — Elf Citizen

Reach

Whenever High-Rise Sawjack blocks a creature with flying, High-Rise Sawjack gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Capenna Express
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Sacrifice a Treasure: Capenna Express becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [snc] A-Paragon of Modernity
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Angel Warrior

Flying

{3}: Paragon of Modernity gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If exactly three colors of mana were spent to activate this ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.

item.title: [snc] A-Ominous Parcel
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: It deals 4 damage to target creature.

item.title: [snc] A-Glittermonger
item.description:
Creature — Elf Rogue

{T}: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

item.title: [snc] A-Masked Bandits
item.description:
Creature — Raccoon Rogue

Vigilance

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

{1}, Exile Masked Bandits from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}" until Masked Bandits is cast from exile. You may cast Masked Bandits for as long as it remains exiled.

item.title: [snc] A-Glamorous Outlaw
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Rogue

When Glamorous Outlaw enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life. Scry 2.

{1}, Exile Glamorous Outlaw from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}" until Glamorous Outlaw is cast from exile. You may cast Glamorous Outlaw for as long as it remains exiled.

item.title: [snc] A-Rakish Revelers
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid Rogue

When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

{1}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.

item.title: [snc] A-Shattered Seraph
item.description:
Creature — Angel Rogue

Flying

When Shattered Seraph enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

{1}, Exile Shattered Seraph from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}" until Shattered Seraph is cast from exile. You may cast Shattered Seraph for as long as it remains exiled.

item.title: [snc] A-Stimulus Package
item.description:
Enchantment

When Stimulus Package enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Sacrifice a Treasure: Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. Scry 1.

item.title: [snc] A-Spara's Adjudicators
item.description:
Creature — Cat Citizen

When Spara's Adjudicators enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls can't attack or block until your next turn.

{1}, Exile Spara's Adjudicators from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}" until Spara's Adjudicators is cast from exile. You may cast Spara's Adjudicators for as long as it remains exiled.

item.title: [snc] A-Riveteers Initiate
item.description:
Creature — Viashino Citizen

{B/G}: Riveteers Initiate gains deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Cabaretti Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Cabaretti Charm deals damage equal to twice the number of creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker.

• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

• Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

item.title: [snc] A-Syndicate Infiltrator
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Wizard

Flying, ward {2}

As long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, Syndicate Infiltrator gets +2/+2.

item.title: [snc] A-Security Rhox
item.description:
Creature — Rhino Warrior

You may pay {R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Spend only mana produced by Treasures to cast it this way.

item.title: [snc] A-Mr. Orfeo, the Boulder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Rhino Warrior

Whenever you attack, double target creature's power until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Forge Boss
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever you sacrifice one or more other creatures, Forge Boss deals 2 damage to each opponent. This ability triggers only once each turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Queza, Augur of Agonies
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Cephalid Advisor

Whenever you draw a card, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [snc] A-Civil Servant
item.description:
Creature — Cat Citizen

Whenever Civil Servant attacks, you may tap another untapped Citizen you control. If you do, Civil Servant gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

item.title: [snc] A-Celestial Regulator
item.description:
Creature — Angel Advisor

Flying

When Celestial Regulator enters the battlefield, choose target creature you don't control and tap it. If you control a creature with a counter on it, the chosen creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [snc] A-Metropolis Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel Soldier

Flying

Whenever you attack with one or more creatures with counters on them, draw a card.

item.title: [a23] Oracle of the Alpha
item.description:
Creature — Bird Wizard

Flying

When Oracle of the Alpha enters the battlefield, conjure the Power Nine into your library, then shuffle.

Whenever Oracle of the Alpha attacks, scry 1.

item.title: [a23] Benalish Knight-Counselor
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Enlist

Whenever Benalish Knight-Counselor enlists a creature, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it."

item.title: [a23] Priest of Possibility
item.description:
Creature — Kor Cleric

When Priest of Possibility enters the battlefield, look at the top seven cards of your library. If a card among them has flying, Priest of Possibility perpetually gains flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance. Then shuffle.

item.title: [a23] Pull of the Mist Moon
item.description:
Enchantment

Kicker {1}{U}

When Pull of the Mist Moon enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Pull of the Mist Moon leaves the battlefield.

When Pull of the Mist Moon enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, choose a nonland permanent in your hand. It perpetually gains "When this permanent enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this permanent leaves the battlefield."

item.title: [a23] Skywriter Djinn
item.description:
Creature — Djinn

Flying

Domain — When Skywriter Djinn enters the battlefield, conjure a random card from Skywriter Djinn's spellbook into your hand. Then if you have fewer cards in hand than the number of basic land types among lands you control, repeat this process.

item.title: [a23] Vesuvan Mist
item.description:
Instant

Kicker {1}{B}

Return target nontoken, nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."

item.title: [a23] Trove Mage
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Trove Mage enters the battlefield, seek an artifact card from among the top ten cards of your library, then shuffle.

item.title: [a23] Darigaaz's Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Kicker {1}{R}

Flying

Whenever you draw a Dragon card, it perpetually gets +1/+1.

When Darigaaz's Whelp enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, seek a Dragon card. Darigaaz's Whelp and that Dragon card each perpetually get +1/+1.

item.title: [a23] Diminished Returner
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Skeleton

Diminished Returner enters the battlefield tapped.

{B}{B}: Diminished Returner perpetually gets -1/-1, then return it to the battlefield. Activate only if Diminished Returner is in your graveyard and its toughness is 2 or greater.

item.title: [a23] Reezug, the Bonecobbler
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Artificer

{T}: Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually becomes an artifact. You may cast that card this turn. (It loses all other card types.)
